@Hansen.

Get winrar and install it on your PC.
Then mark all the files with the same byte size and right-click them.
Select unrar to a location or folder.
Then you have a complete file.
Burn or mount it afterwards to view.

joestotem: extract zips with 7zip, u will get .iso file. Now just burn the iso to dvd5 with nero or whatever programm you ever use :D.
